mapper.sql: ID_, ADDRESS_, EMAIL_, ENABLED_, EXPIRED_, LOCKED_, PASSWORD_, PHONE_, REALNAME_, USERNAME_, USERTYPE_, ORGID, DEPID, PRPHONE_, PROPEN

select
distinct
from sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (ID_, ADDRESS_, EMAIL_, ENABLED_, EXPIRED_, LOCKED_, PASSWORD_, PHONE_, REALNAME_, USERNAME_, USERTYPE_, ORGID, DEPID, PRPHONE_, PROPEN ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expired,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{locked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{depid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propen,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
